Reked

Jekyll Theme

Theme Details:

  • Browser: Edge, Firefox, Safari, Opera, Chrome
  • Compatible with: Jekyll 3.8.x+
  • Support: 3 months of support
View Demo Buy Now – $15

Theme Description

Reked is a minimal and responsive blog theme for Jekyll.

Features

  • 100% responsive and clean theme
  • Optimized for mobile devices
  • Minimal design
  • Valid HTML5 code
  • Post sharing
  • Image Zoom
  • MailChimp Form Widget
  • Supports Disqus Comments
  • Supports Google Analytics
  • Ionicons
  • Google Fonts

Images used only for preview purpose and are not included in your purchased files.
